name: Hunt Down
description:
A Top-down Arcade game where you hunt down monsters! Do it quickly before the time runs out.

Different environments affect your speed, and different monsters move differently. Use the Slash, Spin, and Stab attacks accordingly. Good luck!

Game may break occasionally. Try refreshing site to fix it. Sorry in advance. Potential bug fixes soon to improve the game.

Controls: 

  • Move - Arrow keys
  • Attack - A = Slash  /  S = Spin  /  D = Stab
  • Pause - Space

For the FSU 2021 Fall Game Jam - Adaptation.

Adapt your monster hunting strategies for the changing environment and different type of monster.
